Wichita.Ulrich Museum: The Ulrich Museum is an art museum located on the campus of Wichita State University in Wichita, Kansas. It is known for the large Venetian glass and marble mosaic by Joan Miró, titled Personnages Oiseaux, a 28-by-52-foot (8.5 by 15.8 m) mural on 80 panels. It is also well known for the large outdoor sculpture collection of 76 works across 330 acres, which was named Top Ten among campus sculptures in 2006 by Public Art Review.
